oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Copy prints of Confederate veteran John Hamilton Johnston
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two separate images of Confederate cavalryman Pvt. Johnston as an elderly veteran. He had served in Co. G, 2nd (Ashby's) Tenn. Cav. Regt. CSA, having enlisted at age 23 in Sweetwater, Tenn. on June 28, 1861. Johnston was detailed as a nurse a in 1862 and stationed at the Loudon Hospital by order of General Edmund Kriby Smith. He was discharged due to disability in late 1862.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Johnson, John Hamilton
